General.Name: Banco do Estado do Rio Grande do Sul S.A
General.Description: Banco do Estado do Rio Grande do Sul S.A., a multiple-service bank, provides a range of banking products and services primarily in Brazil, Miami, and the Grand Cayman. It engages in the retail banking, lending, financing and investment, mortgage loan, development, lease portfolio, and foreign exchange activities. The company also offers securities brokerage, management of sales poll groups, payment industry solutions, insurance, and pension plan and saving bonds products. The company was incorporated in 1928 and is headquartered in Porto Alegre, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua CapitAo Montanha, 177, Porto Alegre, RS, Brazil, 90010-040
